feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then periods of light snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
